Balloon shape. Illustration on front of woman holding a product (Triena brand) with images of other packages, for Allied Drug Products Co., Chattanooga, Tennessee; and illustration on back of Dr. Thacher's laxative compound of senna and rhubarb. R. L. Hopper, General Merchandise, Elwood, Texas.
